titleStmt.title: Scotland's soveraignty asserted being a dispute concerning homage, against those who maintain that Scotland is a feu, or fee-liege of England, and that therefore the king of Scots owes homage to the king of England : by Sir Thomas Craig ... ; translated from the Latin manuscript, and a preface added ... by Geo. Ridpath.
titleStmt.author: Craig, Thomas, Sir, 1538-1608.
Ridpath, George, d. 1726.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Andrew Bell ... and sold by Thomas Brown [and 6 others],

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
